item.description:
"The Friends of Fenway Studios is a non-profit organization committed to supporting the Fenway Studios in Boston's Back Bay by helping to ensure its historic preservation as a Boston and National Historic Landmark, and by promoting the cultural enrichment and education of the public and the Fenway artists' unique contributions to art. The Friends of Fenway Studios is also dedicated to safeguarding and fostering affordable studio space for working artists today and for future generations."

Come to their Annual Open Studios Weekend Celebration - tour the studios within this historic building, meet the artists.

11am to 5pm both days, October 25th and 26th FREE admission

Parking will be validated thanks to the generous support of the Danker & Donohue Garage, 341 Newbury Street, Boston.

More details to come, please check their website: http://www.friendsoff...
item.name: Fenway Studios Open Studios Weekend
